entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is being grabbed by Uncle Vernon. (Introduced as 'Harry' in the first sentence.)

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle of Harry's mother and father, who tries to grab Harry. (Introduced as 'Uncle Vernon' in the third sentence.)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends from the Weasley family, who helps pull Harry away from Uncle Vernon. (Introduced as 'Ron' in the fourth sentence.)

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's friends from the Weasley family, who is told to put his foot down by Ron. (Introduced as 'Fred' in the fifth sentence.)

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Harry's friends from the Weasley family, who helps pull Harry away from Uncle Vernon. (Introduced as 'George' in the fourth sentence.)

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Harry's aunt, who is hanging out of the car window with her husband and son. (Introduced as 'Aunt Petunia' in the ninth sentence.)

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is hanging out of the car window with his parents. (Introduced as 'Dudley' in the ninth sentence.)

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who is let out by Ron to fly behind the car. (Introduced as 'Hedwig' in the eleventh sentence.)

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon tries to grab Harry, but is unsuccessful. (Described in the third and fourth sentences.)
Ron tells Fred to put his foot down, which causes the car to accelerate. (Described in the fifth sentence.)
Ron lets Hedwig out of the car so she can fly behind them. (Described in the eleventh sentence.)
